page.title: 08FARMING MIXED - SOFT FRUITS
page.content:
DURING JUNE AND JULY BENTLEY GRANGE FARM OPENS TO THE PUBLIC FOR THE SALE OF{STRAWBERRIES AND RASPBERRIES.}THE PUBLIC PICK THEIR OWN FRUIT AND PAY 35p PER POUND FOR STRAWBERRIES AND 45p PER POUND WEIGHT FOR RASPBERRIES.
{FARM YEAR} LIVESTOCK MAINTAINED EVERY DAY OF YEAR {WINTER}REPAIR MACHINERY, ALTER BUILDINGS,REPAIR WALLS AND FENCES. {SPRING}SPRAY CROPS TO KILL WEEDS, FERTILIZE, CUT GREEN GRASS FOR SILAGE {SUMMER} HARVEST CORN CROPS & FRUIT. {AUTUMN}PLOUGH & PREPARE LAND,SOW CORN. IN THE{DOMESDAY SURVEY 1068}EMLEY HAD ENOUGH LAND TO BE PLOUGHED IN A YEAR USING{ONE PLOUGH}AND SUPPORT A FAMILY. THE FOLLOWING PAGE LISTS MACHINERY AT BENTLEY GRANGE FARM FOR 170 ACRES.
